newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Russia's Yeltsin to make radio address.
newsitem.headline: Russia's Yeltsin to make radio address.

text.p: President Boris Yeltsin, who is preparing for heart surgery, will make a radio address to the nation at 0700 GMT on Friday, a presidential spokesman said.
The spokesman could not give any details about the contents of the president's address.
Yeltsin, 65, whose heart problems have kept him away from his Kremlin office since late June, has addressed the nation on key issues of domestic policy several times since his re-election in July.
Yeltsin is currently in a sanatorium outside Moscow.
